name: Capture Disc
description: Throw toward a wild Loomian for a chance to capture it. Features a fully enclosed vivarium that keeps the Loomian comfortable and provides for its natural needs.

name: Expert Disc
description: A rare type of Capture Disc. It's not any better at capturing Loomians than a standard Capture Disc, so it is mostly used for showing off.

name: Adv. Disc
description: An upgraded Capture Disc with a slightly better chance of capturing Loomians. Features the same enclosed vivarium as a standard capture Disc.

name: Hyper Disc
description: An upgraded Capture Disc with a greater chance of capturing Loomians. Features the same enclosed vivarium as a standard Capture Disc.

name: Plain Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Typeless Loomians.

name: Flame Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Fire-type Loomians.

name: Wave Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Water-type Loomians.

name: Blossom Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Plant-type Loomians.

name: Terra Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Earth-type Loomians.

name: Volt Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Electric-type Loomians.

name: Frost Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Ice-type Loomians.

name: Shine Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Light-type Loomians.

name: Shade Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Dark-type Loomians.

name: Web Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Bug-type Loomians.

name: Alloy Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Metal-type Loomians.

name: Draft Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Air-type Loomians.

name: Noxious Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Toxic-type Loomians.

name: Mental Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Mind-type Loomians.

name: Ghost Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Spirit-type Loomians.

name: Martial Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Brawler-type Loomians.

name: Archaic Disc
description: A unique kind of Capture Disc that has been designed to be keen at capturing Ancient-type Loomians.

name: Wheel Disc
description: A special type of Capture Disc. Its luck at capturing Loomians is unparalleled.

name: Ace Disc
description: A rare Capture Disc that will always capture a wild Loomian without fail. Features the same enclosed vivarium as a standard Capture Disc.

name: Spooky Disc
description: A rare type of capture disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Snowflake Disc
description: A rare type of capture disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Full Heart Disc
description: A rare type of capture disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Broken Heart Disc
description: A rare type of capture disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Meteor Disc
description: A rare type of capture disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Pumpkin Disc
description: A special type of capture disc. It is especially good at capturing Nevermare.

name: Frost Blossom Disc
description: A rare type of Capture Disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Waba Disc
description: A rare type of Capture Disc. It is better than a Hyper Disc.

name: Coal Disc
description: A rare type of capture disc made for trainers on the Naughty List. It is sadly worse than a regular capture disc.

name: Donut Disc
description: A rare type of capture disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Lollipop Disc
description: A rare type of capture disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: C.C. Cookie Disc
description: A rare type of capture disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Skeleton Disc
description: A rare type of Capture Disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Metro Disc
description: A rare type of Capture Disc. It is as good as capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Metro Disc G
description: A special type of capture disc. It is exceptionally good at capturing Metronette.

name: Pumpkin Disc W
description: A special type of capture disc. It is exceptionally good at capturing Nevermare.

name: Egg Disc E
description: A special type of Capture Disc. It is as good at capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Egg Disc K
description: A special type of Capture Disc. It is as good at capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Egg Disc R
description: A special type of Capture Disc. It is especially good at capturing a certain Loomian.

name: Egg Disc B
description: A special type of Capture Disc. It is especially good at capturing a certain Loomian.

name: Egg Disc G
description: A special type of Capture Disc. It is especially good at capturing a certain Loomian.

name: Treasure Disc
description: A special type of Capture Disc. It is as good at capturing wild Loomians as a Hyper Disc.

name: Crown Disc
description: A rare type of Capture Disc. It is better than a Hyper Disc.

name: Omni Disc
description: A limited-edition Capture Disc that will always capture a wild Loomian without fail.

name: Thunderfruit
description: A rare fruit that causes harm if eaten by humans, but may induce evolution if eaten by certain Loomians.

name: Powerfruit
description: When fed to a Loomian, it fills it with power and raises it to the next level. If its level can't rise any higher, the fruit may still cause it to evolve if it is able.

name: Kabunga Coffee
description: When held by a Loomian, it will have a chance each turn during a battle to regain some Energy.

name: Mysterious Dust
description: When held by a Loomian in battle, there is a chance each turn of its Status being cured.

name: Energy Orb
description: Slightly decreases the Energy Cost of a Loomian's moves when held.

name: Drain Orb
description: When held, increases the amount of Health gained when using moves that drain the opponent's Health.

name: Heavy Shackles
description: When held by a Loomian, it will tend to move after all other Loomians in battle.

name: Power Cuffs
description: When held by a Loomian, their Melee and Ranged moves will deal more damage, but will also cost more Energy.

name: Heavy Shield
description: When held by a Loomian, its Ranged Defense is boosted, but using any of its moves will cost a little more Energy.

name: Heavy Armor
description: When held by a Loomian, its Melee Defense is boosted, but using any of its moves will cost a little more Energy.

name: Thunder Orb
description: A Loomian holding this in battle will be inflicted with paralysis.

name: Volcanic Ash
description: A Loomian holding this in battle will be inflicted with a burn.

name: Health Amulet
description: When held by a Loomian, it will gain a small amount of Health at the end of each turn in battle.

name: Typeless Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Typeless moves in battle.

name: Fire Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Fire-type moves in battle.

name: Water Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Water-type moves in battle.

name: Plant Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Plant-type moves in battle.

name: Earth Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Earth-type moves in battle.

name: Electric Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Electric=type moves in battle.

name: Ice Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Ice-type moves in battle.

name: Light Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Light-type moves in battle.

name: Dark Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Dark-type moves in battle.

name: Bug Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Bug-type moves in battle.

name: Metal Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Metal-type moves in battle.

name: Air Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Air-type moves in battle.

name: Toxic Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Toxic-type moves in battle.

name: Mind Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Mind-type moves in battle.

name: Spirit Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Spirit-type moves in battle.

name: Brawler Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Brawler-type moves in battle.

name: Ancient Essence
description: When held by a Loomian, this strange substance will boost the strength of their Ancient-type moves in battle.

name: Mystic Wand
description: When held by Shawchi, this mysterious stick boosts the power of its Ranged attacks.

name: Drop of Youth
description: A drop from the legendary Fountain of Youth. It prevents a Loomian from evolving and boosts its Defenses.

name: Strong Magnet
description: Causes one Metal-type attack that is directed at an ally Loomian to be redirected toward the Loomian equipped with Strong Magnet.

name: Protein Shake
description: A healthy workout supplement for Loomians. A Loomian equipped with Protein Shake will gain double Training Points.

name: Plain Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Typeless attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Flame Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Fire attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Wave Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Water attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Blossom Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Plant-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Terra Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Earth-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Volt Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Electric-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Frost Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Ice-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Shine Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Light-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Shade Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Dark-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Web Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Bug-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Metallic Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Metal-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Draft Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Air-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Noxious Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Toxic-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Mental Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Mind-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Spectral Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Spirit-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Martial Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Brawler-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Archaic Pearl
description: Absorbs half the power of a Ancient-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Plain Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Typeless attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Flame Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Fire attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Wave Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Water attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Blossom Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Plant-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Terra Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Earth-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Volt Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Electric-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Frost Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Ice-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Shine Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Light-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Shade Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Dark-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Web Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Bug-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Metallic Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Metal-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Draft Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Air-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Noxious Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Toxic-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Mental Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Mind-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Spectral Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Spirit-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Martial Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Brawler-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Archaic Shell
description: Increases the Strength of one Ancient-type attack used against the Loomian equipped with this item.

name: Health Reset
description: Using this device on a Loomian will remove some of their Health Training Points.

name: Energy Reset
description: Using this device on a Loomian will remove some of their Energy Training Points.

name: Attack Reset M
description: Using this device on a Loomian will remove some of their Melee Attack Training Points.

name: Attack Reset R
description: Using this device on a Loomian will remove some of their Ranged Attack Training Points.

name: Defense Reset M
description: Using this device on a Loomian will remove some of their Melee Defense Training Points.

name: Defense Reset R
description: Using this device on a Loomian will remove some of their Ranged Defense Training Points.

name: Speed Reset
description: Using this device on a Loomian will remove some of their Speed Training Points.

name: Repellent
description: Prevents encounters with wild Loomians for 200 steps when applied.

name: Ancient Scepter
description: An old, mysterious artifact. Legends say it can be used to evolve a certain Loomian.

name: Molted Claw
description: A sharp husk dropped by a Garbantis after its first molt.

name: Scrap Metal
description: Pieces of high-grade steel made to withstand intense conditions.

name: Spare Cable
description: A cable containing color-coded wires used to transfer heavy loads of power and information.

name: Clear Lens
description: A highly-focused lens capable of zooming up to 200x and focusing elemental bursts of energy.

name: Flame Core
description: A core that enables the execution of burning attacks.

name: Freezer Core
description: A core that enables the execution of freezing attacks.

name: Voltaic Core
description: A core that enables the execution of electrifying attacks.

name: Power Core
description: A core capable of storing large amounts of power. The power can be used to fire elemental bursts.

name: Quantum Core
description: A core designed to process unparalleled quantities of data. This technology was, until recently, believed to be unachievable.

name: Wisp Bottle
description: A bottle containing a rare dye that, when used on a Loomian with a Wisp, will change its wisp's color to another random wisp color. Cannot be used on a Rainbow Wisp, nor create a Rainbow Wisp.

name: Petroliths
description: The fossilized remains of an ancient Loomian. When combined with other pieces, and infused with Soul Crystal energy, life can be extracted from it, and the Loomian revived.

name: Voidstone
description: A somewhat rare stone that can be used to craft Capture Discs.

name: Exchane Gem
description: A peculiar stone that seems to have the power to trigger evolution for Loomians which typically only evolve by trading.

name: Glimmering Scale
description: An exotic scale that is rumored to induce evolution for certain Loomians.

name: Copper Nugget
description: A hunk of copper alloy which exhibits strange magnetic properties. It may be useful for something.

name: Musty Boot
description: A stinky old shoe fished out of the ocean.

name: Rusty Can
description: A rusty can fished out of the ocean.

name: Junk Tire
description: An old, worn-out tire fished out of the ocean.

name: Worn Rope
description: A scrap of heavy-duty rope fished out of the ocean.

name: Rageful Plushie
description: A Loomian equipped with Rageful Plushie, when strucked by a super-effective move, will become enraged, greatly boosting its Melee Attack and Ranged Attack.

name: Clutch Plushie
description: When equipped, a Loomian at full Health may barely withstand an attack that would otherwise knock it out. The item will be used up for the remainder of the battle, and the holder will lose one-tenth of its energy.

name: Specialty Boots
description: A Loomian equipped with Specialty Boots will have increased Speed, but will only be able to use the first move it uses in battle.

name: Coal
description: This might be the last thing that anybody wants to receive as a gift.

name: Spooky Treat
description: A sweet treat found in Dr. Haloine's Nightmare. Dr. Haloine is interested in trading for them.

name: Nightmare Orb
description: A mysterious orb that may help to induce evolution when held by certain Loomians.

name: Jolly Cookie
description: A delicious cookie awarded by Jolly Village's Great Gift Exchange. Mr. Jolly offers other items in exchange for these cookies.

name: Decorative Lights
description: A festive string of lights that may help to induce evolution when held by certain Loomians.

name: Chocolate Bar
description: When a Loomian equipped with Chocolate Bar uses a move in battle, it will consume the item and its move will cost 0 Energy.

name: Delicious Cake
description: A deluxe angel food cake baked with love by the Sweet Retreat Head Chef himself. It is said that it may attract a certain rare Loomian. Many will say this is a lie, though.

name: Birthday Candle
description: A trick candle that is exceptionally difficult to blow out. It is said that it may induce evolution in certain Loomians.

name: Sweets Jar
description: A jar full of tasty sweets. It is said that it may induce evolution in certain Loomians.

name: Meteorite
description: A chunk of matter from space that survived the fall through the atmosphere to the ground. It can be used for trading, and might also be useful for powering up specific Loomians.

name: Matterite
description: A Rare chunk of matter from space that survived the fall through the atmosphere to the ground. It can be used to add minerals to Cosmiore's body.

name: Antimatterite
description: A rare chunk of matter from space that survived the fall through the atmosphere to the ground. It can be used to remove some of the minerals from Cosmiore's body.

name: Candy Corn
description: A sweet treat found in Uhnne Fair. Dr. Haloine is interested in trading for them.

name: Milkshake
description: When the possessor has less than half of its health, it will restore a quarter of its health.

name: Bouquet
description: A beautiful bouquet that shows that you care. Gifting this to a Loomian will help it bond with you.

name: Easter Egg
description: Egg

name: Fractured Crown
description: Broken fragments from a peculiar egg. It is treasured by a certain Loomian.

name: Radianite Egg
description: A rare egg with mysterious powers.

name: Closet Key
description: A key that unlocks the storage closet in the back of the Loomian Laboratory. Mom gave it to you. There are apparently some items in the closet that will be useful to you on your adventure.

name: POLUT Silver Keycard
description: A keycard that has POLUT Corp.'s logo on it. It apparently grants you Silver Access.

name: Dubious Sushi
description: Some Sushi obtained from the New Sushi Stick restaurant. Something about it seems off.

name: POLUT Gold Keycard
description: A keycard that has POLUT Corp.'s logo on it. It apparently grants you Gold Access.

name: Vantacorp Keycard
description: A keycard with a V on it. Despite being found in POLUT Corp., it doesn't seem to go to any of the doors there.

name: Fishing Rod
description: An ordinary fishing rod that allows you to discover extraordinary Loomians.

name: UMV Battery
description: A battery cell that is apparently of use to the Lagoona Lake Research Team.

name: Deeplake Relic
description: An ancient artifact found at the bottom of the lake on Route 8. Its purpose is unknown.

name: Atlanthian Travel Pass
description: A special unlimited pass for traveling to and from Atlanthian. For Platinum VIP members only.

name: Experience Boost
description: This handy device allows Loomians that don't participate in battle to gain experience, and increases the amount of experience gained by benched Loomians.

name: Ability Charm
description: This peculiar charm causes Loomians with rare Abilities to be attracted to its bearer.

name: Roaming Charm
description: This peculiar charm increases its bearer's odds of encountering rare Roaming and Corrupt Loomians in the wild.

name: Gleaming Charm
description: This peculiar charm causes gleaming Loomians to be attracted to its bearer.

name: Rally Charm
description: This charm increases the number of Loomians that can be rallied at Rally Ranch, and allows you to rally Loomians faster.

name: Bob's Bait
description: A special fishing bait that attracts super rare, different-colored Goppies at Bob's Pond.

name: Huge Plushie
description: A massive Weevolt plushie sold by Atlanthian Arcade in limited quantities.

name: Lost Coin
description: For one, a lost coin. For another, a found coin. So which is it, really?

name: Arcade Key
description: A key to the storage closet at Atlanthian Arcade.

name: Magic Chisel
description: A strange chisel. It may have a special effect when used on a certain Loomian.

name: Gate Key
description: A key to the gate just outside Jolly Village.

name: Spoo Key
description: A key to the mausoleum at the Uhnne Fair Cemetery.

name: Jolly Mallet
description: A festively decorated mallet awarded by Jolly Vilage's Great Gift Exchange. Its purpose is somewhat mysterious.

name: Red Tuft
description: A red tuft of fur which can be combined with others to create a special material.

name: Orange Tuft
description: An orange tuft of fur which can be combined with others to create a special material.

name: Yellow Tuft
description: A yellow tuft of fur which can be combined with others to create a special material.

name: Green Tuft
description: A green tuft of fur which can be combined with others to create a special material.

name: Blue Tuft
description: A blue tuft of fur which can be combined with others to create a special material.

name: Violet Tuft
description: A violet tuft of fur which can be combined with others to create a special material.

name: Rainbow Tuft
description: A special rainbow tuft of fur. Some seek after this rare material.

name: Mansion Key
description: A mysterious key crafted in the Uhnne Fair Haunted Corn Maze.

name: Jolly Star
description: Jolly Village's special tree topper. It was misplaced by Mr. Jolly's helper.

name: Red Scale
description: A red fish scale which can be combined with others to create a special item.

name: Orange Scale
description: An orange fish scale which can be combined with others to create a special item.

name: Yellow Scale
description: A yellow fish scale which can be combined with others to create a special item.

name: Green Scale
description: A green fish scale which can be combined with others to create a special item.

name: Blue Scale
description: A blue fish scale which can be combined with others to create a special item.

name: Violet Scale
description: A violet fish scale which can be combined with others to create a special item.

name: Rainbow Scale
description: A special rainbow fish scale. Some seek after this rare item.

name: Small Med
description: This medicine allows a Loomian to recover 20 Health when administered.

name: Medium Med
description: This medicine allows a Loomian to recover 50 Health when administered.

name: Antidote
description: This medicine cures a Loomian of poison when administered.

name: Burn Gel
description: This medicine soothes a Loomian's burn when administered.

name: Paralysis Potion
description: This medicine allows a Loomian to recover from Paralysis when administered.

name: Health Shard
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to increase a Loomian's Unique Health Points when used.

name: Energy Shard
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to increase a Loomian's Unique Energy Points when used.

name: Attack Shard M
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to increase a Loomian's Unique Melee Attack Points when used.

name: Attack Shard R
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to increase a Loomian's Unique Ranged Attack Points when used.

name: Defense Shard M
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to increase a Loomian's Unique Melee Defense Points when used.

name: Defense Shard R
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to increase a Loomian's Unique Ranged Defense Points when used.

name: Speed Shard
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to increase a Loomian's Unique Speed Points when used.

name: Dark Health Shard
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to decrease a Loomian's Unique Health Points when used.

name: Dark Energy Shard
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to decrease a Loomian's Unique Energy Points when used.

name: Dark Attack Shard M
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to decrease a Loomian's Unique Melee Attack Points when used.

name: Dark Attack Shard R
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to decrease a Loomian's Unique Ranged Attack Points when used.

name: Dark Defense Shard M
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to decrease a Loomian's Unique Melee Defense Points when used.

name: Dark Defense Shard R
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to decrease a Loomian's Unique Ranged Defense Points when used.

name: Dark Speed Shard
description: A mysterious shard collected by defeating a corrupt Loomian. It seems to decrease a Loomian's Unique Speed Points when used.

name: Health Gummy
description: A tasty treat enjoyed by Loomians. It increases a Loomian's Health Training Points when consumed.

name: Energy Gummy
description: A tasty treat enjoyed by Loomians. It increases a Loomian's Energy Training Points when consumed.

name: Attack Gummy M
description: A tasty treat enjoyed by Loomians. It increases a Loomian's Melee Attack Training Points when consumed.

name: Attack Gummy R
description: A tasty treat enjoyed by Loomians. It increases a Loomian's Ranged Attack Training Points when consumed.

name: Defense Gummy M
description: A tasty treat enjoyed by Loomians. It increases a Loomian's Melee Defense Training Points when consumed.

name: Defense Gummy R
description: A tasty treat enjoyed by Loomians. It increases a Loomian's Ranged Defense Training Points when consumed.

name: Speed Gummy
description: A tasty treat enjoyed by Loomians. It increases a Loomian's Speed Training Points when consumed.
